concerns.description: Collection of user interaction and compatibility data without explicit mention of personal information or technical data.
concerns.reasoning: The focus was on interaction and compatibility data, but it is unclear if other types of data were collected implicitly.
related_questions: Is any personal or technical data collected implicitly during the experiment?
How is the scope of data collection defined and limited?

concerns.description: Manipulation of compatibility scores may affect the accuracy and reliability of data.
concerns.reasoning: Data was manipulated to observe user behavior, potentially compromising data integrity.
related_questions: How is data quality maintained despite manipulation?
Are there measures to ensure the accuracy of manipulated data?

concerns.description: Data used for internal analysis without clear limitations on extent or scope.
concerns.reasoning: Data was used for research and development, but there is no explicit mention of limitations on internal use.
related_questions: Are there defined limits on how collected data can be used internally?
Is there any risk of data use beyond initial purposes?

concerns.description: Lack of mention of data anonymization or security measures during processing.
concerns.reasoning: Data remained linked to user profiles, raising concerns about privacy and security.
related_questions: What security measures are in place to protect user data?
Is there any anonymization of data during processing?

concerns.description: Lack of transparency regarding data processing and user consent.
concerns.reasoning: Users were not informed about the experiment or given the option to consent.
related_questions: How is information about data practices communicated to users?
Are users informed about the experiments conducted on their data?

concerns.description: No mechanism for users to withdraw consent or delete data post-experiment.
concerns.reasoning: Users were not provided with options to opt-out or delete data, limiting their control over personal information.
related_questions: Can users withdraw consent after data collection?
What options do users have to manage or delete their data?

concerns.description: Unclear if regular audits of data practices are conducted.
concerns.reasoning: The experiment involved data manipulation without explicit mention of audits to ensure proper oversight.
related_questions: Are there regular audits of data practices to ensure compliance?
Who is responsible for overseeing data practices and ensuring accountability?
